info.description: This is my attempt at a reverse engineered Openapi/Swagger 3.0 definition for the PatentsView API. Note that the X-Status-Reason response header is not being displayed.  I have opened an issue with the api provider to try to resolve this.
info.title: Patentsview API

tags.name: get_endpoints
tags.description: published endpoints that accept get requests

tags.name: post_endpoints
tags.description: published endpoints that accept post requests

get.summary: Issue a query to assignees endpoint, and get a json object or xml back.
get.description: Issue a query to assignees endpoint, and get a json object or xml back.

post.summary: Post a query object to the assignees endpoint

get.summary: Issue a query to cpc endpoint, and get a json object or xml back.

post.summary: Post a query object to the cpc endpoint

get.description: Issue a query to locations endpoint, and get a json object or xml back.

get.summary: Issue a query to nber endpoint, and get a json object or xml back.

get.summary: Issue a query to patents endpoint, and get a json object or xml back.

post.description: q is required, f,o,s, format are optional

get.summary: Issue a uspc to patent endpoint, and get a json object or xml back.
get.description: Issue a uspc to patent endpoint, and get a json object or xml back.

post.summary: Post a query object to the uspc endpoint

400.description: Returned when the query parameters are not valid, typically either because they are not in valid JSON format, or a specified field or operator is not valid for this endpoint.

X-Status-Reason.description: uber helpful error string returned by the api that indicates what it did not like about your request.

500.description: Technical difficulties. The api errored out while trying to process your request.
